DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study gather safety data relate use Essure® micro-inserts woman hydrosalpinx prior vitro fertilization pregnancy collect data regard implantation rate , clinical pregnancy rate , pregnancy outcome .
DOC.brief_title: Use Essure® Micro-inserts Women With Hydrosalpinx Prior In Vitro Fertilization : A Prospective , Multicenter , International Feasibility Study
DOC.criteria: Women age 2138 ( unless woman ovum donor cycle age include 43 ) : Are willing participate clinical study Are able comprehend give inform consent participation study Have read , understood sign informed consent form Have unable achieve pregnancy try 1 year great unilateral bilateral hydrosalpinges evidence laparoscopy ultrasound HSG Have Day # 3 serum FSH < 10 , Day # 3 Estradiol < 80 Recipient woman undergo ovum donor cycle donor must Day 3 serum FSH < 10 Day 3 Estradiol < 80 Have antral follicle count 10 great ovary combine , woman use ovum donor ( follicle count ) base eligible donor Have desire receive treatment HS Are willing undergo hysterosalpingogram ( HSG ) 3 month Essure placement confirm proximal tubal occlusion Active recent upper low pelvic infection Known hypersensitivity nickel confirm skin test Known allergy contrast medium Pregnancy suspect pregnancy Delivery termination pregnancy less six week prior Essure microinsert placement BMI > 35 Abnormal pap smear ( CIN2 great abnormality ) within past year Pelvic malignancy Severely retrovert uterus Evidence intrauterine abnormality submucous fibroid , polyp , intrauterine adhesion presence uterine septum Abnormal Clomid Challenge Test abnormal lab value Day # 3 serum FSH Estradiol Antral follicle count le 10 ( ovary combine ) Poor general gynecologic health Inability refusal provide inform consent
